law.text:
The State Board shall adopt regulations to implement the provisions of this subtitle, including regulations that:
For the purpose of implementing § 8-604(a) of this subtitle, identify the types of documents that the Program may require a parent or legal guardian to submit to prove that a child is an eligible child; and
For the purpose of implementing § 8-604(b)(2) of this subtitle, establish factors that the Program shall consider when evaluating whether a parent or legal guardian:
Has the financial means to obtain immediate access to another hearing aid; or
Is making reasonable efforts to obtain immediate access to another hearing aid.
